text:
In Russia, it will be banned to ride electric scooters on the sidewalks
01 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Ilya Sidorov
The Ministry of Transport has prepared traffic rules and signs for electric scooters, gyro scooters, monowheels and segways.
The Office proposes to introduce the term ‚Äúa person using a means of individual mobility for transportation‚Äù. In this category there will be owners of electric scooters and similar vehicles older than 7 years. They will not be equated with pedestrians.
Under the definition of "means of individual mobility" (SIM) fall all devices for moving a person using electric motors or muscle energy.
Up to 14 years of age, you can ride SIM on sidewalks and bike paths. After 14 years, it is proposed to move on the side of roads with a speed of not more than 60 km / h.
The Ministry of Transport has also developed several new signs:
‚ñ™Ô∏è The movement of persons on means of individual mobility is prohibited‚â§Ô∏è Persons on means of individual mobility‚ñ™Ô∏è Except for persons on means of individual mobility
When the new rules come into force and what punishment will be for their violation is unknown. [RIA News]
